posts.post_content:
I have the following T212 Obak type 3s for sale.  All prices are  net  to me, I  accept PP friends and family, or for Regular PP please add 3%  to  cover fees.  Items will  ship upon  receipt of cleared payment.   Shipping is included.  Thanks for looking.

Weaver, Fair- $750
Casey, Scrap- [strike]$225[/strike]sold

PM or e-mail me with any questions.

Weaver still available.  A much lower condition card sold in January 2015 from Kevin Savage auction for  $643, a card with a crease exactly where this one is sold at Huggins and Scott in December 2014 for $1100.  Make an offer!

Ed,

You forgot to mention the official Net 54 stamp on Weaver's reverse.;)

Frank,

I hadn't even noticed the "net54 seal of approval!"  I saw the stamp, but never paid attention to it.  Thanks for the laugh.

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1569033]Ed,

You forgot to mention the official Net 54 stamp on Weaver's reverse.;)[/QUOTE]

Frank, I'm not sure if it's legit or not. Need to send it to SGC for further review or perhaps Leon can verify the stamp lol. 

In all seriousness, a truly beautiful card. Surprised it hasn't found a new home yet.
